verses.text: \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w constructed|strong="H6213"\w* \w buildings|strong="H1004"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w himself|strong="H6213"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w City|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* ark \w of|strong="H1004"\w* God \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w pitched|strong="H5186"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* tent \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H5375"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* said, “\w No|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w carry|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* ark \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* chosen \w them|strong="H5375"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w carry|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* ark \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* \w before|strong="H5704"\w* \w Him|strong="H1732"\w* \w forever|strong="H5769"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w assembled|strong="H6950"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w bring|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ark \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H3559"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1732"\w* \w he|strong="H1732"\w* \w gathered|strong="H1732"\w* together \w the|strong="H1732"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*:
From the Kohathites, Uriel the chief and 120 of his relatives;
from the Merarites, Asaiah the chief and 220 of his relatives;
from the Gershomites,\f + \fr 15:7 \ft Gershomites is a variant of Gershonites; see 1 Chronicles 23:7.\f* Joel the chief and 130 of his relatives;
from the Elizaphanites, Shemaiah the chief and 200 of his relatives;
from the Hebronites, Eliel the chief and 80 of his relatives;
and from the Uzzielites, Amminadab the chief and 112 of his relatives.

\w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w summoned|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w* \w and|strong="H3548"\w* Abiathar \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* Uriel, \w Asaiah|strong="H6222"\w*, \w Joel|strong="H3100"\w*, \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w*, Eliel, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w Amminadab|strong="H5992"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w them|strong="H5927"\w*, “\w You|strong="H3559"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Levitical|strong="H3881"\w* families. \w You|strong="H3559"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* relatives \w must|strong="H3478"\w* \w consecrate|strong="H6942"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H6942"\w* \w so|strong="H5927"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3559"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w bring|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* ark \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w place|strong="H7218"\w* \w I|strong="H3559"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H3559"\w*.

\w It|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* Levites \w were|strong="H7223"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w time|strong="H7223"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* burst \w forth|strong="H6555"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* anger \w against|strong="H6555"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w did|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w consult|strong="H1875"\w* \w Him|strong="H3588"\w* about \w the|strong="H3588"\w* proper \w order|strong="H4941"\w*.” The Priests and Levites Carry the Ark

\w So|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w consecrated|strong="H6942"\w* \w themselves|strong="H6942"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w bring|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* ark \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w carried|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* ark \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w shoulders|strong="H3802"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w poles|strong="H4133"\w*, \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w accordance|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w also|strong="H1732"\w* \w told|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w leaders|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w appoint|strong="H5975"\w* \w their|strong="H8085"\w* relatives \w as|strong="H3881"\w* \w singers|strong="H7891"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w lift|strong="H7311"\w* \w up|strong="H7311"\w* \w their|strong="H8085"\w* \w voices|strong="H6963"\w* \w with|strong="H1732"\w* \w joy|strong="H8057"\w*, accompanied \w by|strong="H5975"\w* \w musical|strong="H7892"\w* \w instruments|strong="H3627"\w*—\w harps|strong="H3658"\w*, \w lyres|strong="H3658"\w*, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w cymbals|strong="H4700"\w*.

\w So|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w appointed|strong="H5975"\w* \w Heman|strong="H1968"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joel|strong="H3100"\w*; \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w his|strong="H4480"\w* \w brothers|strong="H1121"\w*, Asaph \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Berechiah|strong="H1296"\w*; \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w their|strong="H5975"\w* \w brothers|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* Merarites, Ethan \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Kushaiah|strong="H6984"\w*;

\w and|strong="H5654"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* them \w their|strong="H5973"\w* brothers \w next|strong="H4932"\w* \w in|strong="H5973"\w* \w rank|strong="H4932"\w*: \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w*, \f + \fr 15:18 \ft Several Hebrew manuscripts and most LXX manuscripts (see also verse 20 and 1 Chronicles 16:5); most Hebrew manuscripts Zechariah son of or Zechariah, Ben, \f* \w Jaaziel|strong="H3268"\w*, \w Shemiramoth|strong="H8070"\w*, \w Jehiel|strong="H3171"\w*, \w Unni|strong="H6042"\w*, Eliab, \w Benaiah|strong="H1141"\w*, \w Maaseiah|strong="H4641"\w*, \w Mattithiah|strong="H4993"\w*, Eliphelehu, \w Mikneiah|strong="H4737"\w*, \w and|strong="H5654"\w* \w the|strong="H1141"\w* \w gatekeepers|strong="H7778"\w* \w Obed-edom|strong="H5654"\w* \w and|strong="H5654"\w* \w Jeiel|strong="H3273"\w*.\f + \fr 15:18 \ft Hebrew; some LXX manuscripts Obed-edom, Jeiel, and Azaziah or Obed-edom, Jeiel, and Ozias\f*

\w The|strong="H8085"\w* \w musicians|strong="H7891"\w* \w Heman|strong="H1968"\w*, Asaph, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* Ethan \w were|strong="H7891"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w sound|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w bronze|strong="H5178"\w* \w cymbals|strong="H4700"\w*.

\w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w*, \w Aziel|strong="H5815"\w*,\f + \fr 15:20 \ft Aziel is a variant of Jaaziel; see verse 18.\f* \w Shemiramoth|strong="H8070"\w*, \w Jehiel|strong="H3171"\w*, \w Unni|strong="H6042"\w*, Eliab, \w Maaseiah|strong="H4641"\w*, \w and|strong="H5035"\w* \w Benaiah|strong="H1141"\w* \w were|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* play \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w harps|strong="H5035"\w* \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w Alamoth|strong="H5961"\w*.\f + \fr 15:20 \ft Alamoth is probably a musical or liturgical term; here and in Psalms 46:1.\f*

\w And|strong="H3658"\w* \w Mattithiah|strong="H4993"\w*, Eliphelehu, \w Mikneiah|strong="H4737"\w*, \w Obed-edom|strong="H5654"\w*, \w Jeiel|strong="H3273"\w*, \w and|strong="H3658"\w* \w Azaziah|strong="H5812"\w* \w were|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w lead|strong="H5329"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* music \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w lyres|strong="H3658"\w* \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w Sheminith|strong="H8067"\w*.\f + \fr 15:21 \ft Sheminith is probably a musical term; here and in Psalms 6:1 and Psalms 12:1.\f*

\w Chenaniah|strong="H3663"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w head|strong="H8269"\w* \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* director \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* music \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* highly skilled.

\w Berechiah|strong="H1296"\w* \w and|strong="H1296"\w* Elkanah \w were|strong="H7778"\w* to be guardians \f + \fr 15:23 \ft Literally gatekeepers; also in verse 24\f* of \w the|strong="H1296"\w* ark.

\w Shebaniah|strong="H7645"\w*, \w Joshaphat|strong="H3146"\w*, \w Nethanel|strong="H5417"\w*, \w Amasai|strong="H6022"\w*, \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w*, \w Benaiah|strong="H1141"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* Eliezer—\w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*—\w were|strong="H2690"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w blow|strong="H2690"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w trumpets|strong="H2689"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* ark \w of|strong="H6440"\w* God. \w Obed-edom|strong="H5654"\w* \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w Jehiah|strong="H3174"\w* \w were|strong="H2690"\w* \w also|strong="H3174"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w be|strong="H6440"\w* guardians \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* ark. Moving the Ark to Jerusalem

\w So|strong="H1980"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanders|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* thousands \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w rejoicing|strong="H8057"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w bring|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* ark \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Obed-edom|strong="H5654"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w because|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w helped|strong="H5826"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w carrying|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* ark \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w sacrificed|strong="H2076"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w bulls|strong="H6499"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* rams.

\w Now|strong="H5921"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* dressed \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w robe|strong="H4598"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* fine linen, \w as|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H3881"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H3881"\w* \w carrying|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ark, \w as|strong="H3605"\w* well \w as|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w singers|strong="H7891"\w* \w and|strong="H1732"\w* \w Chenaniah|strong="H3663"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* director \w of|strong="H8269"\w* music \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w singers|strong="H7891"\w*. \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w also|strong="H1732"\w* \w wore|strong="H5375"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* linen ephod.

\w So|strong="H5927"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w brought|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ark \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w shouting|strong="H8643"\w*, \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sounding|strong="H8643"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* rams’ \w horns|strong="H7782"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w trumpets|strong="H2689"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w cymbals|strong="H4700"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* music \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w harps|strong="H3658"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w lyres|strong="H3658"\w*. Michal’s Contempt for David (2 Samuel 6:16)

\w As|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* ark \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* entering \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w City|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*’s \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w Michal|strong="H4324"\w* \w looked|strong="H7200"\w* \w down|strong="H8259"\w* \w from|strong="H5704"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w window|strong="H2474"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w dancing|strong="H7540"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w celebrating|strong="H7832"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w she|strong="H3820"\w* despised \w him|strong="H7200"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w her|strong="H7200"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.
